text: Yesli zhe u kogo-libo net raba. to nadlezhit soblyudat' post dva mesyatsa bez pereryva, prezhde chem [suprugi] soydutsya. A yesli kto-libo ne mozhet [soblyudat' post], to nadlezhit nakormit' shest'desyat bednyakov. [Vse] eto - dlya togo, chtoby vy uverovali v Allakha i Yego Poslannika. Eto - ogranicheniya, nalozhennyye Allakhom, a dlya nevernykh ugotovano muchitel'noye nakazaniye
